240.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

356.movie_plot: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

320.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

166.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

337.movie_plot: With the help of a magic ticket, a young film fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action film character.
